The [http://hacktolive.org/wiki/RUNZ RUNZ framework], a pseudo-new way to install and run software on Linux, allowing the use of [[Portable Apps]], super-deb installers, among other possible uses. It is planned to be included in the next version of Super OS<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/RUNZ</ref>. [http://hacktolive.org/wiki/File_mounter File Mounter] is also planned for ''Super OS'' 9.04 Service Pack 1
